text: Retired hockey player Mike Comrie will not be charged. The rape charges brought against Mike Comrie, a former professional hockey player and the ex - husband of Hilary Duff, have been dropped due to insufficient evidence. This February, the 36 - year - old sports star - - who has a five - year - old son named Luca with Hilary - - was accused of raping a woman multiple times after meeting her at a bar. The unidentified woman claimed the sex was consensual until Mike allegedly began engaging in anal sex. According to the accuser, the non - consensual anal sex lasted for 45 seconds. Additionally, the accuser says that the Canadian furniture company heir refused to stop when she asked him to and slapped her.
